captions.text: How could you betray us like this?!
It ain't about the money... huh, hehehe.
It ain't all about the money.

With my dying breath, I offer my soul to thee,
Lady of Vengeance.
We are the Spear of Vengeance.
Your pockets overflow with the spoils of treachery.
Such is the price of betrayal.
